parameters.name: Orientation
parameters.description: Horizontal or vertical cut as defined in swBreakLineOrientation_e

parameters.name: Position1
parameters.description: Location of the first line in the break (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Position2
parameters.description: Location of the second line in the break (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Style
parameters.description: Break line style as defined in swBreakLineStyle_e

parameters.name: ShapeIntensity
parameters.description: Shape intensity for jagged cut break lines only; valid range is 1 (most) through 5 (least)

parameters.name: BreakSketchBlocks
parameters.description: True to break sketch blocks, false to not

title: IView.InsertBreak3
description: Inserts the specified type of break at the specified location in this drawing view.
signature:
System.Object InsertBreak3( 
   System.Int32
Orientation
,
   System.Double
Position1
,
   System.Double
Position2
,
   System.Int32
Style
,
   System.Int32
ShapeIntensity
,
   System.Boolean
BreakSketchBlocks
)

parameters.name: Orientation
parameters.description: Horizontal or vertical cut as defined in swBreakLineOrientation_e

parameters.name: Position1
parameters.description: Location of the first line in the break (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Position2
parameters.description: Location of the second line in the break (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Style
parameters.description: Break line style as defined in swBreakLineStyle_e

parameters.name: ShapeIntensity
parameters.description: Shape intensity for jagged cut break lines only; valid range is 1 (most) through 5 (least)

parameters.name: BreakSketchBlocks
parameters.description: True to break sketch blocks, false to not

remarks:
A break in a drawing view consists of a pair of break lines. This method inserts the break lines at the locations indicated by Position1 and Position2.
If the orientation of the break is...
Then Position1 and Position2 are...
Horizontal
Y values relative to the drawing view origin, indicating where along the Y axis to place the breaks
Vertical
X values relative to the drawing view origin, indicating where along the X axis to place the breaks
